
There is a Cartesian plane. Four points on it represent the houses of Elena Gilbert, Bonnie Bennett, Damon Salvatore and Caroline Forbes. Now, Elena is going to Damon’s home and Bonnie to Caroline’s. Both walk with same speed and they live in a wind free area. Now, you have to tell if they can meet in the way, anyhow..??
Note: They can meet only if their paths cross each other’s.


Input

First line will contain the number of test cases. First line of each test case will contain two numbers x and y, x being x coordinate and y being y coordinate of Bonnie’s place. Similarly second, third and fourth line will contain Caroline’s, Damon’s and Elena’s address respectively.

Output

For each test case there will be just one line of output, “yes” or “no”.


Example

Input:
1
0.0 0.0
4.4 4.0
1.0 2.0
2.0 1.0
Output:
yes
